command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3ENfriyoSGWoaZs.09227e390d16 --database nkYygABVVZPo6zrqu4mzvA --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE propertyImages;
stdout:
Table	Create Table
propertyImages	CREATE TABLE `propertyImages` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `propertyId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `imageUrl` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `nasPath` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `imageType` enum('hausansicht','kueche','bad','wohnzimmer','schlafzimmer','garten','balkon','keller','dachboden','garage','grundrisse','sonstiges','main','exterior','interior','floorplan','map','other') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'sonstiges',
  `sortOrder` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `category` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `displayName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `showOnLandingPage` int(11) DEFAULT '1',
  `isFeatured` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=540001
